name: Hellwalker
description:
Play here: http://hellwalker-games.com/

The fools who sought to contain you will pay!

Make your way through the dungeon and destroy those who oppose you!

Unlock more powerful magic! Fight goblins, shadows, tentacle monsters and sorcerers.

Play the campaign or create your own levels with the level-editor.

Html5 game you can play straight in the browser(Chrome or Firefox).

The source can be found here

The built version can be found in the download. 

OBS! Due to the structure of the game the built files need to be hosted statically. If  you want to play the game i suggest you go to http://hellwalker-games.com/ .
